query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN pesoInicial IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_peso,
  SUM(CASE WHEN altura IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_altura
FROM gestantes
